channel.title: Best client... worst error
channel.description:
ok, here it is straight out, ive been working on a client for my server. The client uses jagex's newest game frame! including the hp and prayer etc on minimap, all the skills are there with the scroll bar. but i have a majour error, now i have managed to bypass the security system jagex placed on their client i cannot make it load the cache! Whatever i try it wont find my cache! [i]or theirs... or silabs...[/i]
Would really like to release this client but at the moment it dosent work grr...
But... as this client is basically jagex's client it will have all the items, npc and emotes.
PLEASE HELP

item.title: Best client... worst error
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Your no help.

Well, im not a client person myself, but try checking a 317 deob, and find the method that loads the cache, and base your coding off that, Keep in mind client differences might alter it.

Read full topic

item.description:
